items.sentence: Tom got everything he wanted on his birthday.
Tom doesn't like it when I ask him questions.
Where we're going to live remains a question.
I hope I haven't done anything inappropriate.
I suspected that Tom was planning to do that.
I suspect Tom and Mary aren't doing that now.
I wish that I were better at speaking French.
Tom may be faster at doing that than Mary is.
I'm not convinced that Tom wanted to do that.
I find it hard to put my thoughts into words.
Tom is likely to be shot if he's not careful.
Did Tom tell you where to put your suitcases?
I've been waiting for you guys all afternoon.
Are you going to leave me here all by myself?
I can help you with that if you'd like me to.
We sat on the park bench and fed the pigeons.
Tom went into the kitchen to get some snacks.
Did anyone other than Tom give Mary anything?
Tom said that Mary hopes that John does that.
This is the last time that I'll ever do this.
